Class Rectangle

  • java.lang.Object
    • mjhv.rectangleTesters.Shapes

  • public class Rectangle
extends mjhv.rectangleTesters.Shapes
    This class represents a double precision Rectangle
    Version:
    9/15/2016
    Author:
    mvalenciano825

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      Rectangle(double x, double y, double width, double height)
      Creates a new instance of a Rectangle object with the left and right edges of the rectangle at x and x + width.

    • Constructor Detail

      • Rectangle

        public Rectangle(double x,
                 double y,
                 double width,
                 double height)
        Creates a new instance of a Rectangle object with the left and right edges of the rectangle at x and x + width. The top and bottom edges are at y and y + height.

      • draw

        public void draw(processing.core.PApplet marker)
        Draws a new instance of a Rectangle object with the left and right edges of the rectangle at x and x + width. The top and bottom edges are at y and y + height.
        Overrides:

      • isSquare

        public boolean isSquare()
        This method checks to see if the rectangle object is also a square
        Returns:
